headerText: The `v-treeview` component is useful for displaying large amounts of nested data.

fileExplorer.desc: Using scoped slots we are able to create an intuitive file explorer

directory.desc: Save requests by supplying a _Promise_ callback and load your data only if/when you need it

hotspots.desc: Customize the **on**, **off** and **indeterminate** icons for your selectable tree. Combine with other advanced functionality like API loaded items.
